title: DQL Query - High Usage User Alerting

create_output.name: create_output
create_output.description: Build a custom task running js Code

input.query:
fetch dt.system.query_executions, from:now()-6h
| sort scanned_bytes desc
| fields timestamp, scanned_GB = scanned_bytes / 1000 / 1000 / 1000, query_string, analysis_timeframe.start, analysis_timeframe.end, client.application_context, execution_duration_ms, user, user.email, client.source
| summarize GBQueried = sum(scanned_GB),by:{client.application_context, user, user.email, query_string, client.source}
| fields User = user, Feature = client.application_context, GBQueried, user.email, query_string, client.source
// | filterOut matchesPhrase(user.email,"dynatrace.com")
| filter isNotNull(Feature) and GBQueried > 5
| sort GBQueried desc
